attributes.action: Remove John Simon Bercow, speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.background:
John Bercow has made it clear he has political bais and partisan political agenda. He has spoke out to not have Rep US President Trump speak in Parliament.

Bercows position demands neutrality. Thus making a mockery of our Parliamentary system, and does not and will not speak for the people.

rejection.details:
There is no mechanism for the removal of a Speaker during a Parliament. Other than at a general election, the Speaker can only stop being Speaker through resignation or death.

If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
